verses.text: And I \w turned|strong="H7725"\w*, and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, there \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from between \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; and the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \add were\add* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

In the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \add were\add* \w red|strong="H0122"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and in the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*;

And in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w* \w grisled|strong="H1261"\w* and \w bay|strong="H0554"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*.\f + \fr 6.3 \ft bay: or, strong\f*

Then I \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me, What \add are\add* these, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*?

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, These \add are\add* the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, which go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from \w standing|strong="H3320"\w* before the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft spirits: or, winds\f*

The \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* which \add are\add* therein go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*; and the \w white|strong="H3836"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them; and the \w grisled|strong="H1261"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H8486"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w bay|strong="H0554"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* that they might walk to and \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Get you \w hence|strong="H3212"\w*, walk to and \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. So they walked to and \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Then \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* he \w upon|strong="H0853"\w* me, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, these that \w go|strong="H3318"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* have \w quieted|strong="H5117"\w* my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* of \add them of\add* the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, \add even\add* of \w Heldai|strong="H2469"\w*, of \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w*, and of \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*, which are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* thou the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w*;

Then \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w crowns|strong="H5850"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josedech|strong="H3087"\w*, the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*;

And \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w speaketh|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* The \w BRANCH|strong="H6780"\w*; and he shall grow \w up|strong="H6779"\w* out of his place, and he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:  +  r 6.12  t grow…: or, branch up from under him *

Even he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and he shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w glory|strong="H1935"\w*, and shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* and \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* upon his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*; and he shall be a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* upon his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*: and the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* shall be between them \w both|strong="H8147"\w*.

And the \w crowns|strong="H5850"\w* shall be to \w Helem|strong="H2494"\w*, and to \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w*, and to \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*, and to \w Hen|strong="H2581"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w*, for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And they \add that are\add* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* in the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you. And \add this\add* shall come to pass, if ye will \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
